messages.speech:
myLogins is a feature that allows you to store login credentials in myCentury so you don't need to enter your username and password information every time you want to access a supported Century College service like D2L Brightspace, eServices, and others.

To access myLogins:

    Log in to myCentury with your StarID credentials. https://my.century.edu/
    Click on the Manage myLogins tile.
    Select one of the Logins menu choices (e.g., StarID).
    Click Store Login Info.
    Enter your login/username and password. Click OK.

Important: Whenever you change your password, you will need to update the saved information.
